title: Tasty Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
content:
The spicy and flavourful chicken curry which is made using some spicy toasted spice powders. The ghee adds a nice flavor to the chicken curry. So good.
 
Ghee Chicken Curry Recipe
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 45 mins
Total time: 55 mins
